div.div: Changes in V A and h 2 with spring temperature.
div.p: (a) Estimated change in additive genetic variance (V A) with 95% confidence interval against standardized spring temperature as predicted from the random regression animal model in which V A and V PE vary with temperature. (b) Estimated change in heritability across spring temperature as predicted from a model where V A and V PE changed with standardized spring temperature; each point represents the year specific (and thus temperature specific) h 2 estimate.
